comment: Enjoyed Dr. Share's class.  Kind of difficult and the assignments are a bit crazy but fun to do.  Wouldn't want to take this class with anyone else besides her!
Wonderful professor! There is a lot of work, but her expectations are clear. She provides wonderful examples, and she brings lots of classroom experience to the class!

I LOVED Dr. Share's class! Everything we did in her class was relevant to teaching. She has a unique outlook on teaching and has great experience. We had to make a WebQuest which was really fun and something different. I would highly recommend taking her. You will learn a lot in her class and never be stressed.

I LOVED Dr. Share's class! Everything we did in her class was relevant to teaching. She has a unique outlook on teaching and has great experience. I would highly recommend taking her. You will learn a lot in her class and never be stressed.
Awesome. Everything in her class seems relevant to becoming a teacher. She's pleasant and helpful. The work isn't easy, but she gives plenty of time to complete it. I definitely recommend!
